name: Hook & Reel Cajun Seafood & Bar
address: 133-40 79th St Suite H, Howard Beach, NY 11414, USA

Thank you Donte for helping us celebrate our mom's birthday! You were a big help and have the patience of a virtue lol with all the drink spills and numerous orders of crab bites! We wish you all the best at hook & reel.  Hope to see you again!

Alana was a amazing server.she was friendly and very knowledgeable. Her customer service skills was on point. Getting my order right. Food and drinks was good, but I was disappointed that the all you can eat was no longer available.

Alana was super nice and very help and kind and really nice I love her service a lot

I felt unwanted. There was no acknowledgment, no greeting. It felt horrible. I took my order to-go. When I opened my food to eat I find a hair.

It‚Äôs sad that businesses don‚Äôt realize they lose so much with poor customer service.
I would‚Äôve loved to come again and again but I won‚Äôt with this type of service and food slacking.

The food was outstanding. Although service was good, the restaurant was short-staffed during after-school hours. Our waitress provided excellent service, demonstrating remarkable memory, but was responsible for multiple tables, requiring us to seek assistance from the busser. We also needed to inquire about a missing platter for the birthday girl. Ultimately, all our needs were met. The children, including the birthday girl, received complimentary ice cream. The flounder Po Boy I ordered was tasty but could have included an additional piece of fish. The restaurant's atmosphere is exceptionally relaxed and comfortable. The presence of a DJ kit in the dining area suggests an energetic ambiance on weekend evenings. This venue is ideal for birthday celebrations, and I would definitely return. The restaurant's location within a mall offers convenient and free parking.

Alana was amazing. I am always watching how I‚Äôm treated and handled by servers at restaurants. I will definitely come back and hopefully she‚Äôs my server again. She was very attentive, sweet and communicated nicely. She had a lot of patience as well. We need more servers like her‚ù§Ô∏è

I went inside Hook and Reel linden wood location. It was with my family it was just us 5. We ordered the lunch boil special, Cajun fries, sodas, crab legs, and it was so delicious. We had an awesome time at Hook and Reel. Our server was Selena. She took the time to get our orders and even asked if we needed anything else. Very considerate with time and questions we had. When we asked for something she took a few seconds and got it for us very quick paced. Not many servers today take this time and should be commended for. Thank you Selena. You made our family lunch day special. Hook and Reel will be our go to spot in future occasions.

Came here with my bestie and the kids, and the vibes were immaculate. Alana was our waitress, and she was super nice, constantly checking on us. It was my first time, so she was very patient and explained the boil menu to me. Overall, the food was great! Loved my lobster tail, and the music created a real vibe. I‚Äôll definitely be back!
Alana was cordial and awesome waiter - really enjoyed her energy and the boil was great! Second time here and would def come again :) dessert was my fave

The service we received from our waitress Alana was exceptional. She was courteous, efficient, and very knowledgeable about the menu. Her positive energy and attention to detail really elevated our dining experience. Truly one of the best servers we‚Äôve had in a long time!

I recently dined at this Hook & Reel location, and it was an unforgettable experience! The food was absolutely delicious, BEST wings!

But what truly made my night special was the bartender, Nicole. She crafted the most incredible cocktails, balancing flavors like a true mixologist. Not only were the drinks top-notch, but her hospitality was next level‚Äîattentive, friendly, and full of recommendations.

The food is very tasty, compared to the other location on Ralph!! The service provided was much better than the other times I was there.  Atmosphere is always welcoming, DJ never disappoint.
I've been here quite a few times but never experienced such a lovely waitress! Alana, is pleasant, cheerful, and a vibe in her own little way!

I had such a great experience! Our server was attentive, friendly, and made sure we had everything we needed without ever feeling rushed. She checked in on us at the right times, offered helpful recommendations, and kept a warm, positive attitude throughout the meal. Her excellent service really made our visit enjoyable‚ÄîI would definitely come back again and ask for her!

I had a great time here celebrating with my friends. The food is TOP TEIR I reheated my wings and left over seafood the next day and it tasted like it was just cooked and placed in front of me. The people there are such a vibe and so kind service was speedy. It was just such a good time.
Nikita was soo sweetü§©had a great time. I always come here so far she‚Äôs definitely the best waitress I‚Äôve had here.
My server Tanesha was amazing. Very communicative, engaging, attentive and funny. Great atmosphere I will be back to see her she made all the difference

TeeTee is an absolute gem of a server! From the moment we walked in, she brought positive energy, genuine warmth, and exceptional attention to detail. She‚Äôs quick, efficient, and always had a smile on her face. She‚Äôs the kind of sever who makes the whole experience better. We were lucky to have her!
Alana is very pleasant and friendly. she checked on me and expedited my meal as I requested . I love me some hook &reel
Crystal was amazing and had great energy! The food was top tier. I would definitely come back.

I decided to check out this seafood spot called ‚ÄúHook & Reel‚Äù after a friend suggested it. We were there to celebrate my oldest son‚Äôs upcoming kindergarten graduation on June 7, 2024. As we arrived, I felt a bit uncertain. I really enjoy seafood‚Äîactually, I love it‚Äîbut my kids are pretty picky and typically stick to chicken nuggets and fries. I thought, well, it's dad's celebration, so I might as well treat myself to some crab legs while they play on their phones. I promised to take them to McDonald‚Äôs afterward.

When we got inside, I did what I usually do and let the server know that my kids are autistic. It‚Äôs just important for safety and a few other reasons. She then informed me that they charge for kids, even if they weren‚Äôt going to eat anything. I asked if she could check with the manager because I really wanted to try the food. She was kind enough to ask, and the manager agreed‚Äîthough he warned me that if he saw the kids eating even a little, I would be charged.

Since it was happy hour, there were two menu options available. One option had mussels, shrimp, and more, while the pricier choice included crab legs. I opted for the basic one to see how it was. Just a heads up, they also have a rule that says you have to finish everything on your plate; otherwise, you‚Äôll be charged based on the leftover weight. There were so many rules I didn‚Äôt know about before coming here that I might have passed on this recommendation altogether. And yes, that friend is still around, but I won‚Äôt be taking any more of their suggestions.

When the food arrived, the only thing that was somewhat decent was the wings. The seafood tasted old; the shrimp was unclean, and everything else was lacking flavor. When the bill came, I was shocked to find that for two adults, I still ended up paying over $100 for happy hour. I honestly wouldn't recommend this place‚Äîthe service was just okay, not great. The food was pretty terrible, and I had to trick myself into eating it because I didn‚Äôt want to get hit with a charge for wasting food. Thank goodness I only took small samples.
Service was Great!! Chantel  was amazing! Came in for my little sister birthday with a big group and baby she took care us! Service was amazing!! S/o to Chantel!!! Thank you for everything!!

Talia was our server (trained by Crystal) she was very helpful. The food was amazing and the atmosphere really make me feel under the sea . Talia and Crystal were attentive and very respectful. Also I loved the music played .
Nyce Vybes!!! Nyce music...The TV Hella big!!! Food great!!! N I just quit my 9 to 5... My sever Chantek.was the great!!! Drinks right!!!
I really enjoyed TeeTee being our server she was awesome had fun with will for sure come again because of her and we‚Äôll be asking for her!!
Food was great Alana was amazing she took good care of me and my family will be back soon

Haven‚Äôt been here in a while but I came on Friday and they had a live dj who was playing good music. I ordered a chicken salad which was yummy and a lemon drop shot, my waitress tee tee was very well spoken and was really good with her service . I will definitely come back on a Friday again

Exceptional service from our waitress Crystal. She was attentive, knowledgeable about the menu, and had a warm smile that made our dining experience truly special. Orders were accurate, and she checked in on us just the right amount of times. Highly recommend!
Great service!!!! Our server was Crystal, she hosted us with smiles and respect. The operation manager Darek was also very helpful. Very nice behavior.

I had the pleasure of being served by Nicole at the Howard Beach location. She is one of the best bartenders I‚Äôve encountered in a long time. From the moment I sat down, she was welcoming, attentive, and truly skilled at her craft. Not only were the drinks perfectly balanced and beautifully presented, but the conversation and vibe she brought to the bar made the entire experience memorable. It‚Äôs clear she takes pride in what she does and genuinely enjoy making people feel at home. I‚Äôll definitely be back‚Äîbartenders like this are rare!
Tee Tee held it down! The food was great! The music was a vibe! The drinks were immaculate! I‚Äôm coming back !

Here on business and first  time at Hook & Real. Crystal  (my server) was amazing!! Me being in the customer service field where at times I audit the worker that result to guest satisfaction, I must say I can appreciate a worker who has the skills in the field. Welcoming, friendly, checking in and smiling :) THANK YOU for providing a good experience at Hook & Reel.

Amazing time every single time I come here, crystal was a great host/server she took care of our table and kept checking on us. She fulfilled all our needs and made us feel very comfortable. Will be back

Me and my girlfriend came back here and we requested Alana . as always very respectful and very joyful bubbly. she‚Äôs truly good at what she does. made us feel welcomed and was very attentive with us . she‚Äôs quick paced and I see that she usually has multiple tables but she makes sure to check in every 10-15 minutes to make sure everything is okay . when we come back we are definitely requesting her . we definitely enjoyed our experience once again . Alana for th win.

From start to finish Xaulanda provided excellent service . I am from out of town . After a long 14 hour flight I just wanted good service and food . She provided exactly what I needed in a timely manner.

My first time here wasn‚Äôt the best, but fast-forward two years later and Krystal completely changed my experience. She was amazing‚Äînothing like my first visit. I‚Äôll definitely be coming back again, and much sooner this time

Loved the experience, it was pretty quick to get seated, food was amazing and Chantel was a great server. I didn‚Äôt know what to order and she was pretty helpful bringing ideas of what I could order. Would definitely recommend coming in.

‚ú® ‚ÄúAbsolutely outstanding! The seafood was incredibly fresh, bursting with flavor, and cooked to perfection. Every dish tasted like it came straight from the ocean to the table. The presentation was beautiful, and the service was warm and attentive, making the whole experience even more enjoyable. If you‚Äôre a seafood lover (or even if you‚Äôre not!), this place is a must-visit. I can‚Äôt wait to come back!‚Äù ü¶ûüêü
Had a birthday meal with family and our server was excellent. Her name was Lili and she went above and beyond to give us a great experience. She should be the blueprint for hiring servers

I wanted to give this highly rated restaurant a try but definitely wish I didn't. First thing the drinks were horrible and we were given house liquor when the ingredients clearly stated the tequila would be Teremana... the drink overall had to be made from someone who is truly not a bartender..you can just tell. The food was subpar, the hush puppies did not have crab AT ALL in it...not sure what type of fish was in it...it smelled very FISHY. The seafood boil was OVERCOOKED and I did not get the flavor and spice I requested. The waiter did fix the spice part though. The wings are baked not fried...it honestly tastes microwaved. The garlic noodles were an absolute joke...GROSS. The BATHROOM took the cake for me. The sink faucet is so GROSS..I can't believe they would allow this mold/mildew to grow to this point and what's crazy it the water runs through this omg NEVERRR AGAIN....PLEASE DO BETTER!

Nikita is a wonder sever.. nice respectful and always checked on us‚Ä¶ maybe because it wasn‚Äôt that busy‚Ä¶but still that‚Äôs not the point‚Ä¶ her skills is why I‚Äôm writing this review‚Ä¶ you go girl
Alana was an excellent server. Great personality. She had a bubbly attitude and I really appreciated it. Her service is A+.

They must have a new cook, I ordered fried oysters and they were super hard, way too much batter. the presentation wasn't appealing at all. food was much better when they first opened. I'll try them one more time if they screw up they won't see me again.
